name: Genesis Hooks
author: Travis Smith & Rafal Tomal

sections.description:
Genesis Hooks automatically displays Genesis structual hook names in the browser for all pages. It also allows you to add any hooks that you may have added to various pages like templates or the home page.

IMPORTANT:
You must have Genesis installed. Click here to learn more about Genesis

Special Thanks

I owe a huge debt of gratitude to all the folks at StudioPress, their themes make life easier.

And thanks to the various individuals who helped me through the beta testing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire genesis-hooks folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add more hook names to the plugin via Genesis > Theme Settings
sections.faq:
Do you have future plans for this plugin?

None at this time.

  • If you have suggestions, please feel free to contact me
sections.changelog:
0.7

  • Fixed strange DEBUG notice

0.6

  • Dropped support for versions less than Genesis 1.8

0.5

  • Added genesis_widget_area() dynamic hooks

0.4.2

  • Added German translation props to deckerweb

0.4.1

  • Fixed options check

0.4

  • Added Role/Capability filter option

0.3

  • Added WordPress Comment Form Actions (not supported by Genesis)

0.2

  • Added Genesis Featured Widget Amplified Support

0.1

  • Private Beta
